nodes.text: Brinebrew was a salty beverage. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, the Iyra sentientologist Tem Eliss drank brinebrew from a mug in his office at the University of Sanbra, a school located on the planet Sanbra, as he worked on a manuscript called The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life and sat in his aquachair.

The short story "An Extinct Guest," written by Trevor J. Wilson and Craig Robert Carey, features brinebrew. The story was published in August 1997 as part of the article "Alien Encounters" in Star Wars Adventure Journal 14.
